com.gh.bmd.rfc.android.filter

Interface FilterBuilder<T extends SparseIterable<E>,E>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the iterable type.
    E - the element type.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BooleanFilterBuilder, IntFilterBuilder, LongFilterBuilder, LongSparseArrayFilterBuilder<V>, SimpleArrayMapFilterBuilder<K,V>, SparseArrayCompatFilterBuilder<V>, SparseArrayFilterBuilder<V>, SparseBooleanArrayFilterBuilder, SparseIntArrayFilterBuilder, SparseLongArrayFilterBuilder, SupportLongSparseArrayFilterBuilder<V>

    public interface FilterBuilder<T extends SparseIterable<E>,E>
    This interface defines a builder of filters associated with a SparseIterable instance.

    Created by davide on 3/16/14.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T element(Object element)
      Creates a filter matching the specified object and returns the filtered iterable.
      T elements(Collection<?> elements)
      Creates a filter matching the specified collection of objects and returns the filtered iterable.
      T elements(Iterable<?> elements)
      Creates a filter matching the objects returned by the specified iterable and returns the filtered iterable.
      T elements(Object... elements)
      Creates a filter matching the specified objects and returns the filtered iterable.
      T first(int count)
      Creates a filter matching the first count elements and returns the filtered iterable.
      T from(int index)
      Creates a filter matching all the elements greater or equal than the specified index and returns the filtered iterable.
      T indexes(Collection<Integer> indexes)
      Creates a filter matching all the elements whose index is included in the specified index collection and returns the filtered iterable.
      T indexes(int... indexes)
      Creates a filter matching all the elements whose index is included in the specified index array and returns the filtered iterable.
      T indexes(Iterable<Integer> indexes)
      Creates a filter matching all the elements whose index is included in the specified index iterable and returns the filtered iterable.
      T last(int count)
      Creates a filter matching the last count elements and returns the filtered iterable.
      T matching(AdvancedFilter<E> filter)
      Add the specified advanced filter to the iterable and returns the latter.
      T matching(Filter<E> filter)
      Add the specified filter to the iterable and returns the latter.
      T to(int index)
      Creates a filter matching all the elements less or equal than the specified index and returns the filtered iterable.
